name: platform-onboarding-team
description: Comprehensive platform onboarding with specialized analysts for codebase architecture, CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure setup, and test strategy. Produces a unified onboarding guide with architecture overview, pipeline recommendations, and testing strategy.

members.name: onboarding-coordinator
members.description: Coordinates new service or team onboarding across architecture, pipeline, infrastructure, and testing dimensions. Produces a comprehensive onboarding guide with architecture overview, pipeline setup recommendations, and testing strategy.

members.name: codebase-navigator
members.description: Analyzes codebase architecture, maps component relationships, traces data flow through the system, identifies entry points, key abstractions, and domain boundaries that a new team needs to understand.

members.name: pipeline-analyzer
members.description: Reviews existing CI/CD configuration, maps build and deployment stages, identifies pipeline bottlenecks, evaluates artifact management, and recommends improvements for reliability and speed.

members.name: infrastructure-auditor
members.description: Reviews infrastructure setup for best practice adherence, identifies gaps in IaC coverage, evaluates environment configuration, and documents the infrastructure topology for onboarding context.

members.name: test-orchestrator
members.description: Analyzes existing test strategy across unit, integration, and end-to-end layers, identifies coverage gaps, evaluates test quality and reliability, and recommends a testing approach for the onboarding team.
